title: Is it true that 'Fintech' is threatening conventional finance companies? What will payment look like in the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fintech is a tool that can be used by conventional investment dealers, but can also provide automated financial advisory services that bypass traditional dealers. Is it threatening conventional financial advisor firms? Not really, the do-it-yourself market in Canada is about 8% of the market and has been at that level for over 30 years. I’m guessing the levels are similar in the US. Investment management, financial planning and estate planning which all go together, requires in-person expertise. Most people want somebody else that they trust to look after these things for them given the complexity of laws. The person-to-person relationship will take a long time to be replaced, if at all.
